Reference

Data: Fisheries (CalCOFI)

Generate figures for CalCOFI dataset.

calcofi_map()

Map of CALCOFI sites

calcofi_plot()

Produces plots of CALCOFI data

Data: Oceanography (ERDDAP)

Extract, calculate and plot oceanographic data.

calculate_SST_anomaly()

Calculate SST anomaly

calculate_statistics()

Generate statistics for any missing months for NMS Sanctuary

get_dates()

Get date range for an ERDDAP data set

ply2erddap()

Extract ERDDAP statistics from polygon by year-month

plot_metric_timeseries()

Plot ERRDAP time series data

plot_SST_anomaly()

Plot SST anomaly data

Data: Rocky intertidal (MARINe)

Produce interactive maps and plots.

read_csv_fmt()

read_csv_fmt BEN

make_sites_csv()

make_sites_csv BEN

map_nms_sites()

Produce a map of where rocky intertidal data was collected

plot_intertidal_nms()

Generate a plot of intertidal monitoring data

Reporting functions

Render html for R markdown files that form the modal windows.

generate_html_4_rmd()

Generate the html for R markdown files

get_figure_info()

Generate hyperlinked gray bar above figure

get_modal_info()

Generate introductory info for the html of a modal window

md_caption()

Generate the caption for a figure

render_all_rmd()

Render all rmd files in the modals folder that have been changed

render_figure()

Produce full html for static figures, minus tooltips.

glossarize_md()

Insert html tags for glossary tooltips into md files

insert_tooltip()

Insert tooltips into text.

rmd2html()

Render html for rmd file, including glossary tooltips.

Sanctuaries utilities

Utility functions for Sanctuary regions.

get_nms_polygons()

Get National Marine Sanctuary polygons
